Text: This is the very first torrent I have created.  Please post to let me know whether or not you were able to successfully download this e-book.  I will be seeding indefinitely.
Thank you ChloeBlue! This is a great find and I'm looking forward to using the treatment.
You are SO welcome...I hope it's working for you.  PLEASE be sure to use a "cosmetic grade" of turpentine which can be found in art supply stores.
Thanks ChloeBlue, I've been reading your posts on curezone also, I've just bought some turpentine and am going to try it tomorrow morning, will post back if I'm still alive, and keep you updated.
Thank you to ChloeBlue and all seeders!
Excellent e-book thank you so much for seeding it.
